queryMap.query: SELECT /* d06000016-query:tbdn_strt_mesur_cd_fn001 */ '0' AS CHK ,RACER_PERIO_NO ,ITEM_CD ,SEX_GBN ,SORT_ORD FROM TBDN_STRT_MESUR_CD WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = NVL(?, RACER_PERIO_NO) ORDER BY SORT_ORD, SEX_GBN
SELECT /* d06000016-query : tbdn_strt_mesur_cd_fn002 */ CD RACER_PERIO_NO FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD = 'D10000' ORDER BY CD DESC

SELECT /* d06000016-query : tbdn_strt_mesur_bas_fn001 */ B.RACER_PERIO_NO ,B.ITEM_CD ,C.CD_NM AS ITEM_NM ,B.SEX_GBN ,D.CD_NM AS SEX_GBN_NM ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 100 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_FROM_SCR END),0) AS BAS_100FROM_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 90 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_FROM_SCR END),0) AS BAS_90FROM_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 80 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_FROM_SCR END),0) AS BAS_80FROM_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 70 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_FROM_SCR END),0) AS BAS_70FROM_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 60 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_FROM_SCR END),0) AS BAS_60FROM_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 50 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_FROM_SCR END),0) AS BAS_50FROM_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 40 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_FROM_SCR END),0) AS BAS_40FROM_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 30 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_FROM_SCR END),0) AS BAS_30FROM_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 20 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_FROM_SCR END),0) AS BAS_20FROM_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 10 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_FROM_SCR END),0) AS BAS_10FROM_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 100 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_TO_SCR END),0) AS BAS_100TO_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 90 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_TO_SCR END),0) AS BAS_90TO_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 80 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_TO_SCR END),0) AS BAS_80TO_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 70 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_TO_SCR END),0) AS BAS_70TO_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 60 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_TO_SCR END),0) AS BAS_60TO_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 50 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_TO_SCR END),0) AS BAS_50TO_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 40 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_TO_SCR END),0) AS BAS_40TO_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 30 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_TO_SCR END),0) AS BAS_30TO_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 20 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_TO_SCR END),0) AS BAS_20TO_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 10 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.BAS_TO_SCR END),0) AS BAS_10TO_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 100 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.ASSIGN_SCR END),0) AS ASSIGN_100_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 90 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.ASSIGN_SCR END),0) AS ASSIGN_90_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 80 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.ASSIGN_SCR END),0) AS ASSIGN_80_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 70 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.ASSIGN_SCR END),0) AS ASSIGN_70_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 60 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.ASSIGN_SCR END),0) AS ASSIGN_60_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 50 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.ASSIGN_SCR END),0) AS ASSIGN_50_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 40 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.ASSIGN_SCR END),0) AS ASSIGN_40_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 30 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.ASSIGN_SCR END),0) AS ASSIGN_30_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 20 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.ASSIGN_SCR END),0) AS ASSIGN_20_SCR ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ASSIGN_SCR = 10 AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.SEX_GBN = B.SEX_GBN THEN A.ASSIGN_SCR END),0) AS ASSIGN_10_SCR FROM TBDN_STRT_MESUR_BAS A,TBDN_STRT_MESUR_CD B,TBDM_SPEC_CD C,TBDM_SPEC_CD D WHERE B.ITEM_CD = C.CD(+) AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.GRP_CD = 'D10058' AND B.SEX_GBN = D.CD(+) AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.GRP_CD = 'D10023' AND B.RACER_PERIO_NO = A.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND B.RACER_PERIO_NO = ? GROUP BY B.RACER_PERIO_NO,B.ITEM_CD,B.SEX_GBN,C.CD_NM,D.CD_NM ORDER BY B.ITEM_CD, B.SEX_GBN
SELECT /* d06000016-query : tbdn_dt_strt_mesur_fn001 */ DISTINCT RACER_PERIO_NO ,DT FROM TBDN_DT_STRT_MESUR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? ORDER BY DT ASC

SELECT /* d06000016-query : tbdn_dt_strt_mesur_fn002 */ TCI.RACER_PERIO_NO RACER_PERIO_NO , TCI.CAND_NO CAND_NO , TCI.NM_KOR NM_KOR , ? DT , ROUND(TDWE.SCR_101,1) SCR_101 , ROUND(TDWE.SCR_102,1) SCR_102 , ROUND(TDWE.SCR_103,1) SCR_103 , ROUND(TDWE.SCR_104,1) SCR_104 FROM TBDN_CAND_IDENT TCI , ( SELECT CAND_NO , MIN(DECODE(ITEM_CD, '101', REC)) SCR_101 , MIN(DECODE(ITEM_CD, '102', REC)) SCR_102 , MIN(DECODE(ITEM_CD, '103', REC)) SCR_103 , MIN(DECODE(ITEM_CD, '104', REC)) SCR_104 FROM TBDN_DT_STRT_MESUR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND DT = ? AND ITEM_CD IN ('101', '102', '103','104') GROUP BY RACER_PERIO_NO , CAND_NO , DT ) TDWE WHERE TCI.CAND_NO = TDWE.CAND_NO(+) AND NVL(TCI.DEL_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND TCI.RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND TCI.CAND_NO NOT IN ( SELECT CAND_NO FROM TBDN_TEMP_ABS WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND GEN_DT < ? AND GBN IN ('001', '003') ) ORDER BY TCI.CAND_NO

SELECT /* d06000016-query : tbdn_dt_strt_mesur_fn003 */ RACER_PERIO_NO ,ITEM_CD ,SEX_GBN ,ASSIGN_SCR ,BAS_FROM_SCR ,BAS_TO_SCR FROM TBDN_STRT_MESUR_BAS WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? ORDER BY RACER_PERIO_NO,ITEM_CD,SEX_GBN,ASSIGN_SCR

SELECT /* d06000016-query : tbdn_dt_tot_strt_mesur_fn001 */ A1.RACER_PERIO_NO ,A1.CAND_NO ,A1.NM_KOR ,MAX(A1.SEX_GBN) SEX_GBN ,ROUND(AVG((A1.SUM01_REC)/A1.CNT01),1) AS AVG01_REC ,ROUND(AVG((A1.SUM02_REC)/A1.CNT02),1) AS AVG02_REC ,ROUND(AVG((A1.SUM03_REC)/A1.CNT03),1) AS AVG03_REC ,ROUND(AVG((A1.SUM04_REC)/A1.CNT04),1) AS AVG04_REC FROM ( SELECT B.RACER_PERIO_NO ,B.CAND_NO ,B.NM_KOR -- ,DECODE(SUBSTR(MAX(FC_DEC(B.RES_NO)),7,1),'1','001','002') AS SEX_GBN ,DECODE(MIN(SEX), 'M', '001', 'F', '002') AS SEX_GBN ,SUM(CASE WHEN ITEM_CD = '101' THEN A.REC END) AS SUM01_REC ,SUM(CASE WHEN ITEM_CD = '102' THEN A.REC END) AS SUM02_REC ,SUM(CASE WHEN ITEM_CD = '103' THEN A.REC END) AS SUM03_REC ,SUM(CASE WHEN ITEM_CD = '104' THEN A.REC END) AS SUM04_REC ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ITEM_CD = '101' THEN 0 END) AS CNT01 ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ITEM_CD = '102' THEN 0 END) AS CNT02 ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ITEM_CD = '103' THEN 0 END) AS CNT03 ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ITEM_CD = '104' THEN 0 END) AS CNT04 FROM TBDN_CAND_IDENT B, TBDN_DT_STRT_MESUR A WHERE B.RACER_PERIO_NO = A.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND B.CAND_NO = A.CAND_NO(+) AND NVL(B.DEL_YN,'N') = 'N' AND B.RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND B.CAND_NO NOT IN ( SELECT CAND_NO FROM TBDN_TEMP_ABS WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND GBN IN ('001', '003') ) GROUP BY B.RACER_PERIO_NO,B.CAND_NO,B.NM_KOR )A1 GROUP BY A1.RACER_PERIO_NO,A1.CAND_NO,A1.NM_KOR ORDER BY A1.RACER_PERIO_NO,A1.CAND_NO

SELECT /* d06000016-query : tbdn_dt_tot_strt_mesur_fn002 */ RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,DT ,SUM(CASE WHEN ITEM_CD='101' THEN REC END) AS ITEM01_REC ,SUM(CASE WHEN ITEM_CD='102' THEN REC END) AS ITEM02_REC ,SUM(CASE WHEN ITEM_CD='103' THEN REC END) AS ITEM03_REC ,SUM(CASE WHEN ITEM_CD='104' THEN REC END) AS ITEM04_REC FROM TBDN_DT_STRT_MESUR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = NVL(?, CAND_NO) GROUP BY RACER_PERIO_NO,CAND_NO,ROUND,DT ORDER BY DT,ROUND

SELECT /* d06000016-query : tbdn_round_strt_mesur_fn001 */ A2.RACER_PERIO_NO RACER_PERIO_NO ,A2.CAND_NO CAND_NO ,A2.SEX_GBN SEX_GBN ,A2.NM_KOR NM_KOR ,A2.ROUND ROUND ,A2.DT DT ,A2.ITEM01_REC ITEM01_REC ,A2.ITEM01_SCR ITEM01_SCR ,A2.ITEM02_REC ITEM02_REC ,A2.ITEM02_SCR ITEM02_SCR ,A2.ITEM03_REC ITEM03_REC ,A2.ITEM03_SCR ITEM03_SCR ,A2.ITEM04_REC ITEM04_REC ,A2.ITEM04_SCR ITEM04_SCR ,A2.ITEM05_REC ITEM05_REC ,A2.ITEM05_SCR ITEM05_SCR ,A2.ITEM06_REC ITEM06_REC ,A2.ITEM06_SCR ITEM06_SCR ,A2.ITEM07_REC ITEM07_REC ,A2.ITEM07_SCR ITEM07_SCR ,A2.ITEM08_REC ITEM08_REC ,A2.ITEM08_SCR ITEM08_SCR --,A2.ITEM09_REC ITEM09_REC --,A2.ITEM09_SCR ITEM09_SCR --,A2.ITEM10_REC ITEM10_REC --,A2.ITEM10_SCR ITEM10_SCR --,A2.ITEM11_REC ITEM11_REC --,A2.ITEM11_SCR ITEM11_SCR ,'' TOT_SCR ,'' AVG_SCR ,RANK() OVER (ORDER BY NVL(A2.TOT_SCR,0) DESC) RANK --,DECODE(NVL(A2.TOT_SCR,0),0,999,DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY NVL(A2.TOT_SCR,0) DESC)) RANK FROM ( SELECT B.RACER_PERIO_NO ,B.CAND_NO ,B.NM_KOR ,A.ROUND ,A.DT -- ,DECODE(SUBSTR(FC_DEC(B.RES_NO),7,1),'1','001','002') SEX_GBN ,DECODE(MIN(SEX), 'M', '001', 'F', '002') AS SEX_GBN ,MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='001' THEN A.REC END) AS ITEM01_REC ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='001' THEN A.SCR END),0) AS ITEM01_SCR ,MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='002' THEN A.REC END) AS ITEM02_REC ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='002' THEN A.SCR END),0) AS ITEM02_SCR ,MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='003' THEN A.REC END) AS ITEM03_REC ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='003' THEN A.SCR END),0) AS ITEM03_SCR ,MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='004' THEN A.REC END) AS ITEM04_REC ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='004' THEN A.SCR END),0) AS ITEM04_SCR ,MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='005' THEN A.REC END) AS ITEM05_REC ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='005' THEN A.SCR END),0) AS ITEM05_SCR ,MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='006' THEN A.REC END) AS ITEM06_REC ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='006' THEN A.SCR END),0) AS ITEM06_SCR ,MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='007' THEN A.REC END) AS ITEM07_REC ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='007' THEN A.SCR END),0) AS ITEM07_SCR ,MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='008' THEN A.REC END) AS ITEM08_REC ,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='008' THEN A.SCR END),0) AS ITEM08_SCR --,MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='009' THEN A.REC END) AS ITEM09_REC --,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='009' THEN A.SCR END),0) AS ITEM09_SCR --,MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='010' THEN A.REC END) AS ITEM10_REC --,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='010' THEN A.SCR END),0) AS ITEM10_SCR --,MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='011' THEN A.REC END) AS ITEM11_REC --,NVL(MAX(CASE WHEN A.ITEM_CD='011' THEN A.SCR END),0) AS ITEM11_SCR ,SUM(A.SCR) AS TOT_SCR --,AVG(A.SCR) AS AVG_SCR FROM TBDN_CAND_IDENT B, TBDN_ROUND_STRT_MESUR A WHERE B.RACER_PERIO_NO = A.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND B.CAND_NO = A.CAND_NO(+) AND NVL(B.DEL_YN,'N') = 'N' AND B.TH_STAT NOT IN ('004','005') AND A.ROUND(+) = ? AND B.RACER_PERIO_NO = ? GROUP BY B.RACER_PERIO_NO,B.CAND_NO,B.NM_KOR,A.ROUND,A.DT )A2 ORDER BY CAND_NO, A2.SEX_GBN
INSERT INTO TBDN_STRT_MESUR_CD ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,ITEM_CD ,SEX_GBN ,SORT_ORD ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_STRT_MESUR_CD SET SORT_ORD = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND ITEM_CD = ? AND SEX_GBN = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_STRT_MESUR_CD WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND ITEM_CD = ? AND SEX_GBN = ?
INSERT INTO TBDN_STRT_MESUR_BAS ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,ITEM_CD ,SEX_GBN ,ASSIGN_SCR ,BAS_FROM_SCR ,BAS_TO_SCR ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_STRT_MESUR_BAS SET BAS_FROM_SCR = ? ,BAS_TO_SCR = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND ITEM_CD = ? AND SEX_GBN = ? AND ASSIGN_SCR = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_STRT_MESUR_BAS WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND ITEM_CD = ? AND SEX_GBN = ? AND ASSIGN_SCR = ?
INSERT INTO TBDN_DT_STRT_MESUR ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,DT ,ITEM_CD ,ROUND ,REC ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_DT_STRT_MESUR SET ROUND = ? ,REC = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND DT = ? AND ITEM_CD = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_DT_STRT_MESUR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND DT = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_DT_STRT_MESUR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND DT = ?
INSERT INTO TBDN_ROUND_STRT_MESUR ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,ITEM_CD ,DT ,ROUND ,REC ,SCR ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_ROUND_STRT_MESUR SET DT = ? ,REC = ? ,SCR = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND ITEM_CD = ? AND ROUND = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_ROUND_STRT_MESUR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND ITEM_CD = ? AND ROUND = ?
